name: jason-munro/cypht
description: Lightweight Open Source webmail written in PHP and JavaScript

suggest.ext-PDO: To use database features, this needs to be installed
suggest.ext-redis: To use Redis for caching, this needs to be installed
suggest.ext-gd: To use 2fa, this needs to be installed for the QR code display
suggest.ext-memcached: To use Memcached for caching, this needs to be installed
suggest.ext-gnupg: To use the PGP module set, this needs to be installed
